entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
